content:
IRedirectOutput Interface

Definition

Defines methods that capture output that would otherwise go to the console. This interface is implemented by the VsaEngine.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("5B807FA1-00CD-46ee-A493-FD80AC944715")]
public interface IRedirectOutput

Methods

SetOutputStream(IMessageReceiver)

When implemented in a class, redirects the specified output stream to a new stream or data storage.

public void SetOutputStream (Microsoft.JScript.IMessageReceiver output);
output
IMessageReceiver

The output to redirect.
